meanings: Noun 광물용어 boulder blasting, secondary blasting
(신문·잡지 등의 수효) number of copies, (판매 부수) circulation

examples.korean: All you have to do is just crush frozen milk with a spoon. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러분은 숟가락으로 얼린 우유를 부수기만 하면 됩니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: All you have to do is just crush frozen milk with a spoon. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They are meant for breaking up crab and turtle shells or for crushing bones. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 게와 거북이 껍질 혹은 뼈를 부수기 위해 있습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: They are meant for breaking up crab and turtle shells or for crushing bones. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They have large molar teeth and strong jaw muscles for crushing tough bamboo. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 질긴 대나무를 부수기 위해 큰 어금니와 강한 턱 근육을 가지고 있습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: They have large molar teeth and strong jaw muscles for crushing tough bamboo. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After you have eaten something, your stomach begins to mix and grind the food with its muscular walls. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무언가를 먹은 후에 여러분의 위는 위벽의 근육을 이용하여 음식을 섞고 잘게 부수기 시작합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: After you have eaten something, your stomach begins to mix and grind the food with its muscular walls. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: However because photodegradation breaks plastic into small parts it is really difficult to fish it out of the water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 빛에 의한 분해는 플라스틱을 작게 부수기 때문에 물에서 건져내기가 아주 어렵다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: However because photodegradation breaks plastic into small parts it is really difficult to fish it out of the water. Add to Wordbook
